reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautiful in color and appreciate its nice quality, comfort, and warmth.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THE SWEATER!!
items.body: This shirt is EVERYTHING. Sized up for an oversized look. It’s heavy cable knit. Such amazing quality. Bought the burgundy and the color is beautiful. Could easily be from a big brand. Never disappointed with tops from Trendy Queens! Buy the sweater - you’ll love it Read more
items.author: Where’d You Get That?

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty color
items.body: Very nice and comfy. Not scratchy. Read more
items.author: Francine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome sweater!
items.body: I love the fit, and how warm it is! Especially today because it is super windy and cold and it still kept me warm. Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made, but extremely over-sized.
items.body: This is a well-made sweater but is extremely oversized. Comments saying true to size are confusing to say the least. I ordered my regular size (L) and it almost hung to my knees and was twice as wide as my body. I would need to be 4 inches taller and heavier to wear it. Very disappointing, I would love to re-order but do not want to chance it. Amazon is great about returns and I appreciate that, but it is troublesome to keep going through this where clothing is concerned. Also, the sweater is not true white, but a deep cream winter-white color. Read more
items.author: VR

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but slightly damaged
items.body: It’s cute but it came with loose black strings attached to the sweater Read more
items.author: Chezni Carver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite sweater!
items.body: This sweater is nice quality, looks great and is warm! I can wear it for work or wear it out with a pair of jeans! I don’t buy many ‘hand wash only’ clothes but, this sweater is worth the extra care! Read more
items.author: Deanna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big and long
items.body: Great heavy weight sweater. Runs very big. Read more
items.author: C. L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Runs big , i like it but it was just too big Read more
items.author: James Brown

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Off-white, Cream, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
